com.google.common.truth

Class AbstractVerb<T extends AbstractVerb<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.truth.FailureContext
      • com.google.common.truth.AbstractVerb<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestVerb

    public abstract class AbstractVerb<T extends AbstractVerb<T>>
extends FailureContext
    A parent type for some infrastructure used in the Verb.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractVerb.DelegatedVerb<S extends Subject<S,T>,T>
      A special Verb implementation which wraps a SubjectFactory

      • withMessage

        public abstract T withMessage(@Nullable
                              String messageToPrepend)
        Overrides the failure message of the subsequent subject's propositions.
        Parameters:
        messageToPrepend - a descriptive message.
        Returns:
        A custom verb which will show the descriptive message along with the normal failure text.
        See Also:
        com.google.common.truth.delegation.DelegationTest

      • withMessage

        public abstract T withMessage(@Nullable
                              String format,
                              Object... args)
        Overrides the failure message of the subsequent subject's propositions.
        Parameters:
        format - a descriptive message with formatting template content.
        args - object parameters to be substituted into the message template.
        Returns:
        A custom verb which will show the descriptive message along with the normal failure text.
        See Also:
        com.google.common.truth.delegation.DelegationTest

      • about

        public final <S extends Subject<S,D>,D,SF extends SubjectFactory<S,D>> AbstractVerb.DelegatedVerb<S,D> about(SF factory)
        The recommended method of extension of Truth to new types, which is documented in com.google.common.truth.delegation.DelegationTest.
        Parameters:
        factory - a SubjectFactory<S, D> implementation
        Returns:
        A custom verb for the type returned by the SubjectFactory
        See Also:
        com.google.common.truth.delegation.DelegationTest

      • about

        public final <V extends AbstractDelegatedVerb> V about(DelegatedVerbFactory<V> factory)
        A generic, advanced method of extension of Truth to new types, which is documented on DelegatedVerbFactory. Extension creators should prefer SubjectFactory if possible.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of AbstractDelegatedVerb to return
        Parameters:
        factory - a DelegatedVerbFactory<V> implementation
        Returns:
        A custom verb of type <V>
